thread.title: ‘Abortion Access More Popular Than Trump’ Banner Flies Over the March for Life
thread.title_full: ‘Abortion Access More Popular Than Trump’ Banner Flies Over the March for Life

author: Claire Landsbaum
title: ‘Abortion Access More Popular Than Trump’ Banner Flies Over the March for Life
text:
Although Donald Trump’s approval ratings have risen slightly since his inauguration, he’s still not exactly popular. So during the March for Life in Washington D.C. Friday, pro-choice activists decided to remind him of that fact.

The activist group UltraViolet hired a plane to fly a banner... More »
